name: visualizations
description: While on a trip to [Malta](https://www.google.ca/maps/place/Malta/@35.9440174,14.3795242,11z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x130e45281d8647c5:0xf582d86136be4239) several years ago, I took a look inside a wild and wonderful church to see what is one of the largest domes in Europe.  I was struck by the geometric pattern of the inside of the dome, which I found mesmerizing.
